00035 class OBAPI GasteigerState
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     GasteigerState();
00039     ~GasteigerState() {}
00040 
00041     void SetValues(double _a,double _b,double _c,double _q)
00042     {
00043         a = _a;
00044         b = _b;
00045         c = _c;
00046         denom=a+b+c;
00047         q = _q;
00048     }
00049 
00050     double a, b, c;
00051     double denom;
00052     double chi;
00053     double q;
00054 };
00055
